title: The Prices
body: When Riot sale a skin/champion at 50% they reduce the price only at RP why not and IP. Is not necessary 50% for my even 25% sounds pretty good.

replies.body:
Help & Support isn't the best place for suggestions. Your best bet is to post this on the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), as that's the most appropriate place for any sort of suggestion for features or changes.

Let me know if you have any questions.
